website_summaries.verdict: This vegetarian supplement is formulated with holy basil, designed to boost immune system function, regulate moods, and assist with brain function, cortisol levels, and memory.
pros: Free from dairy, soy, synthetic fillers, artificial flavors, or colors
Some users report more energy, better sleep, and less stress
cons: As with many supplements, not all users report desired effects or changes
Some reports of headaches or GI distress

customer_reviews.title: I am a teacher at the elementary level.. ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher at the elementary level...I notice a difference when I don't take my holy basil!! It definitely helps me roll with things, and to be calmer and even keeled to the constant barrage of questions, issues, and redirects in the day-to-day high energy of any classroom :).
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaR

customer_reviews.title: Calms me down!
customer_reviews.text: I get highly anxious, I pop one of these babies right when I get to work and I can manage my ADHD anxiety much better!
customer_reviews.author: sasha nash

customer_reviews.title: Capsules Not Completely Filled
customer_reviews.text: The last bottle I received had many capsules that were not completely filled. I have been using this product for many years and it has been helpful as a mood stabilizer. I was very disappointed with this last batch which is a quality control issue. Am not sure I will be purchasing from this company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Really Effective!
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this for two weeks now and this product has been helping me with my anxiety - more than other herbal products I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos M.

customer_reviews.title: Zen in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking this supplement by this brand maker for years and swear by the efficacy. I’ve tried other brands and none work as well or as quickly ask this. I take one pill 30 minutes before any stressful situation and I am gifted consistently with instant zen.
customer_reviews.author: Achievers

customer_reviews.title: No safety seal!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was really looking forward to using this product. It was recommended to me by a colleague who uses it daily. I received my bottle with the safety seal torn off. What’s weird is that the bottle came in a box that was sealed, and with all 30 capsules as the product states. Now I wonder if the product has been tampered with. #Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Brand, Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: This brand is amazing! It is a bit pricey however I did get $10 off so it most definitely was worth the money and I only have to take one capsule a day which is GREAT! Thank you for being Awesome! ❤️

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Used to take Abilify for depression, but now use New Chapter Holy Basil. It really works for me.

customer_reviews.title: Great for immune system
customer_reviews.text: Been taking these for over a year, no stress relief or memory help but I can tell you it has done wonders for my immune system. Just for that i haven't stopped taking them.

customer_reviews.title: Usually very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: This was sad. Bottle badly broken in product box. Shards of glass.

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!!! DO NOT BUY THESE.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this product before from my local health food store, and these do not smell nothing like basil. When I broke the seal an alcohol smell came from the bottle and they look like someone glued them together.

customer_reviews.title: This was too strong for me. I took this ...
customer_reviews.text: This was too strong for me. I took this brand many years ago in a lower strength and it worked very well.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do what it says. I'm sleeping better and calmer.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: I definitely know when I do not take it. I'm a much happier and calmer person.

customer_reviews.title: Heartburn City
customer_reviews.text: These veggie caps are different. They do have the calming effect but now I get heartburn. The other caps don't do that. I'm going to try and return these. $40 bucks is to much to waste for something I can't use.
customer_reviews.author: Lou G.

customer_reviews.title: heart palpitations etc and since I have been taking this (only about 1 week now) I feel so much better. No more of the above
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a huge help for me. I was experiencing panic attacks, dizziness, heart palpitations etc and since I have been taking this (only about 1 week now) I feel so much better. No more of the above! Great NATURAL product. It seems pricey but to me well worth being able to take something that actually helps and there are no chemicals and junk which are not good for us!
customer_reviews.author: CouponMom

customer_reviews.title: Darkened my white hairs!!
customer_reviews.text: I just turned 35 and I have been having some white hairs that would come in here and their randomly. However recently after starting New Chapter’s Holy Basil once at night, I started noticing less and less white strands of facial hair coming through. I wasn’t sure at first what was going on and what product what’s causing this benefit. I researched Holy Basil and grey/white hair. I found that one benefit is that it helps restore an enzyme in the hair follicle that helps neutralize white and Grey hair. It has to do with Hydrogen peroxide being neutralized in the hair follicle to keep from bleaching. I have noticed this benefit very strongly. Very cool!
customer_reviews.author: CMDR_Sanford

customer_reviews.title: It's a subtle mood enhancer + ally he awesome benefits you can find online
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd bottle & it works. It's a subtle mood enhancer + all the awesome benefits you can find online. I currently take 2 daily before noon and drink a cup of tulsi close to evening. Give it a 3 months trial ... you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Calla Lily

customer_reviews.title: and enjoyed the effects of it for a few hours
customer_reviews.text: I've only just started using but found these supplements to be fairly effective! I felt relaxed and calm after taking one, and enjoyed the effects of it for a few hours. It's certainly not a magical cure to worrying or feeling anxious but it can take the edge off, especially when accompanied by other stress reducing activities.
customer_reviews.author: JLR94118

customer_reviews.title: Trying this for insominia
customer_reviews.text: I started taking New Champer Holy Basil because I cannot sleep. Livestrong.com Here is a partial quote from that website "Managing anxiety and depression may, in turn, help treat insomnia ..." So far I have not noticied any improvement. Will update if any change.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love this Holy Basil!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Holy Basil. The capsules are easy to swallow. For me, I feel so much better when I take this Holy Basil. It really affects my mood in a super positive way. I take this along with a good probiotic.

customer_reviews.title: Calming and tension relieving.
customer_reviews.text: Works well to diffuse tension or irritability. Cannot take it at night because it gives me insomnia. Kept me from getting frustrated and angry while taking steroids!

customer_reviews.title: Best Natural calming supplement
customer_reviews.text: Holy Basil by New Chapter is the best to keep you calm and in control when you feel overwhelmed and ready to blow up. Non addictive as it is a natural organic herb, one dose in the morning will keep you ready and alert to take on the day's routine with its unexpected challenges.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Best company to order from.

customer_reviews.text: Holy basil is an amazing supplement and a staple in my household. The quality makes a big difference though. This brand is a 5 star!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have taken this product for years helps with anxiety and sleep

customer_reviews.title: New Chapter's Holy Basil rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It was recommended to me for sleep-it is doing the job. I am having the best sleep I have had in years.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Excellent herb.
customer_reviews.text: Took my work stress levels down. Works great. Definitely recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Didn't Work For Me
customer_reviews.text: This product has such good reviews, so I'm sure this is probably a high quality supplement, unfortunately it didn't work for me or for my husband. For me, it just gave me heartburn and made me feel tired, and not a nice relaxing, calming, sleepy tired, just made me feel a more exhausted kinda tired. As for my husband, he said it did nothing for him except give him headaches. Reading a lot of the reviews, I'm glad this product works for so many people, unfortunately I guess it just doesn't work for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: reactions to holy basis
customer_reviews.text: I tried holy basil for three days...dosage was two capsules 800 mg - I decided to cut it in half to try. unfortunately, after a while, I found my heart raced a little bit, which I found most disturbing. I tried with food and first thing in the morning and it happened the three times I ingested it.
customer_reviews.author: marie puma

customer_reviews.title: Keep foregtting I have this in my tool kit, works as well as benzos and ssri meds
customer_reviews.text: I am having trouble coping day to day and everything seems to unhinge my brain and hijack panic in me. It's debilitating and unsettling to say the least. This along with l-theanine, lavender and st.johns capsules, and brain/mind are my go toos. they even out the impending doom of anxiety along with the heart pilpitions, sweatiness, racing thoughts, fast speech, and fear. and seem to work just as well as prozac, wellbtrin, zyprexa, anti anxiety pills, as all of those cause me extreme panic, manic feels, and anxiety unpon injesting. Will keep using these for the rests of the month and report back with dosing and findings.
customer_reviews.author: Shaikss

product_meta.title: New Chapter Stress Relief Supplement - Holy Basil Force with Supercritical Holy Basil for Stress Support + Immune Support + Non-GMO Ingredients - 120 ct Vegetarian Capsules
product_meta.description: Size:120 Count (Pack of 1)| Style:Vegetarian CapsuleMany companies isolate elements from an herb, concentrate them, and label it "whole herb." New Chapter delivers the wisdom of whole food. Using only natural supercritical CO2 or traditional techniques of extraction, our Force extracts guarantee the fullest spectrum of beneficial phytonutrients in their natural profile. The herb Holy Basil has been long employed by India's Ayurvedic masters to support a positive stress response and healthy mood and spirit.
feature_bullets: Cognitive Support: Holy Basil Promotes supports your alertness, focus and healthy attention span including speed of memory and short-term recall*
IMMUNE SUPPORT: Holy Basil supports immune cells and multiple markers of healthy immune function*
Acts as an Antioxidant, helping to protect against oxidative stress*
Same Great Formula: Our trusted and pure Holy Basil formula is rapidly available for absorption, delivered in an improved capsule that protects the herbs from oxidation
Non-GMO Project Verified, 100% Vegetarian, Gluten Free, Dairy Free, Soy Free, No Synthetic Fillers, No Artificial Flavors or Colors

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
